page.title: 11TOUR OF THE VILLAGE 2
page.content: Starting at the crossroads called Battens Cross,take the left turn from Tiverton ,up the hill.As you follow the road round you take the right turn at the next junction which leads you down hill into Higher Town.This is thought to be the oldest part of the original the village with a variety of house styles and is another residential area.There is a new housing estate called Blackdown View. It looks over the Culm Valley towards the Blackdown hills and Sidmouth gap. To the left you can see the escarpment made for the North Devon Link Road and the hill called Coniger in the foreground.In the valley the is a farm and also a old mill now used by a carpenter.
